rows.name: question_1
rows.value: How many minutes did it take you to prepare for this session?

rows.name: question_2
rows.value: How many minutes did it take you to travel to the location where the session was delivered?

rows.name: question_3
rows.value: How many minutes did it take you to deliver the sessions?

rows.name: question_4
rows.value: Which of the parents in this group attended your in-person session?

rows.name: text_instruction
rows.value: Please check all the activities you completed during this session:

action_list._raw:
click | set_data |
_list_id: report_answers,
_id: @fields.current_report_no,
question_1: @local.answer_1,
question_2: @local.answer_2,
question_3: @local.answer_3,
dynamic_question: @local.dynamic_string
